Please Read All Instructions Carefully

This experiment explores how people solve logical puzzles under time pressure. You will solve a series of logical puzzles by reordering objects based on provided statements. Your goal is to complete as many trials as accurately as possible within 20 minutes.

Make your browser window FULL SCREEN and CLOSE ALL OTHER TABS.
DO NOT REFRESH YOUR BROWSER during the study.

If you believe a trial is problematic, note the trial ID and message us via Prolific after completing the study.

You can drag or swap objects, or click RESET to return to the original state.
